posts.post_content:
Looking to pick up some more T210 catchers. 

Looking for nice examples with minimal chipping and no creasing. Still need an orange border for my collection as well.

Will pay strong and I do have some trade material also available.

Have the following cards already:

Charles Belew, Fort Worth (Series 2)
Frank Bannon, Anderson    (Series 5)
George Cowan, Portsmouth (Series 2)
Martin Dudley, Augusta      (Series 1)
Frank Harrington, Spartansburg (Series 5)
Harry Kunkel, Danville (Series 2)
Joseph Laughlin, Danville (Series 2)
Fred Lucia, Lynchburg (Series 2)
MacConachie, Norfolk (Series 2)
Clarence Munson, Norfolk (Series 2)
Sid Smith, Atlanta (Series 8)
Adolph "Ade" Thoss, Richmond (Series 6)
Harry Wahl, Jacksonville (Series 1)

Thanks in advance,

Patrick
Good luck. Wohlleben was difficult for me to track down.
